DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure arterial 99mTc-Tilmanocept uptake use single photon emission compute tomography ( SPECT/CT ) scan HIV infected subject know subclinical coronary atherosclerosis assess contrast-enhanced coronary compute tomography angiography ( CCTA ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Detailed Description : Patients HIV show increase atherosclerotic risk compare age-matched control , risk think relate increased systemic immune activation . Specifically , systemic immune activation may contribute destabilize coronary atherosclerotic plaque , lead plaque rupture myocardial infarction . This study intend measure arterial uptake macrophage specific marker 99mTc-Tilmanocept use single photon emission compute tomography , apply initially group HIV-infected patient know subclinical coronary atherosclerosis CCTA . Moreover , traditional marker CVD risk inflammatory marker assess relation CV imaging outcome . Positive finding index HIV group know subclinical atherosclerosis prompt subsequent study three comparison group , .
